results.deck: FCI is the international arm of the Fujisankei Communications Group, a Japanese conglomerate responsible for Fuji TV and many other companies.
results.description: FCI primarily published games for the NES, including several that were released in Japan by Pony Canyon, another company under the FCG umbrella.
results.name: FCI

game.name: Break Time: The National Pool Tour
Might and Magic III: Isles of Terra
